definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. mountains of daggers and seas of flames/fig. extreme danger (idiom)

sentences.english: The Churchill bushfire burnt out more than 30, 000 hectares of land.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾山火燒燬了超過3萬公頃的土地。

sentences.english: Moreover, suggestions for the prevention from trips caused by bushfire are also listed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 並對今後預防輸電線路山火跳閘工作提出了改進意見。

sentences.english: The high fire danger warning is likely be in place for the rest of the week.
sentences.chinese: 這周接下來的時間裏可能發佈高危山火警報。

sentences.english: More than 50 large uncontained wildfires are burning across the country right now.
sentences.chinese: 目前，全國共發生50多起大的山火。

sentences.english: Authorities said the bushfires could take many days to control.
sentences.chinese: 當局說山火還需多日才能控制。

definition: wildfire/(spreading like) wildfire/bush fire/farm fire (for clearing fields)
